elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: What can the concept of Theme-Centered Interaction TCI be used for?
elements.correctAnswer: to determine the position of individuals and groups and for further development

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the aim of TCI?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What is meant by the GLOBE in the four-factor model? Give a concrete example from your life.
elements.correctAnswer: the external conditions, the environment, the context / e.g. club

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What is meant by ES in the four-factor model? Give a concrete example from your life.
elements.correctAnswer: the common topic, concern, goal; the joint work, task, etc. / e.g. preparing a presentation

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Dynamic processes are constantly taking place in life. What does this mean for the four factors?
elements.correctAnswer: They are constantly changing and are always in mutual exchange.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Which skills are particularly important in such dynamic processes?
elements.correctAnswer: Ability to adapt and integrate, communication skills, ability to work in a team
